name: The State of Wyoming Quiz | States | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the average HIGH temperature in July in Casper, Wyoming?
Which Wyoming city is host to one of the World's largest rodeos?
Which of the following National Parks is found in Wyoming?
questions.explanation:
Grand Teton National Park.

	Yosemite is in California, Great Smoky is in Tennessee and Glacier is in Montana.

questions.text: What is the state bird of Wyoming?
What is the state flower of Wyoming?
What is the capital of Wyoming?
What River flows through Casper Wyoming?
What animal is found on the flag of Wyoming?
Which city in Wyoming was founded in 1896 by Buffalo Bill?
questions.explanation:
Cody.

	Yes he named it after himself.
